title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication System
summary: Develop a secure multi-factor authentication (MFA) system to protect customer login and access.
description: Implement a security layer that requires customers to verify their identities through multiple factors, such as password, OTP, or biometric verification. Ensure compliance with banking security regulations, provide secure session management, and include account recovery workflows. Integrate risk-based authentication to monitor suspicious login behaviors and protect sensitive financial data from unauthorized access.

title: Personalized Customer Dashboard
summary: Deliver a dynamic dashboard customized to display relevant banking products and services based on user profiles.
description: Design a personalized dashboard that consolidates all critical banking information, including account balances, transaction summaries, service requests, and tailored product offerings. The system should use real-time data from the bank’s systems and machine learning for product eligibility and recommendations. The interface must be visually appealing, intuitive, and secure, allowing customers to navigate easily while promoting engagement.

title: Responsive and Accessible Portal Interface
summary: Ensure the portal provides a consistent, user-friendly experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
description: Build a responsive user interface (UI) capable of adapting to different devices and screen sizes. The design should comply with modern accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1) to support inclusive usage. Prioritize a seamless user experience with fast navigation, consistent layout behavior, and optimized load times for both low and high bandwidth connections.

title: Streamlined Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
summary: Allow customers to open accounts and modify services online through guided, simplified workflows.
description: Create intuitive workflows for new account opening, credit card requests, and existing service modifications. This process must include automated KYC verification, data validation, form autofill for known information, and minimum manual input requirements. Workflows should integrate with core banking services for validation, maintain audit trails, and deliver a frictionless experience from application initiation to completion.

title: Application Save and Resume Capability
summary: Allow users to save unfinished applications securely and resume later from any device.
description: Implement a feature enabling customers to save incomplete applications in encrypted storage and resume later after authentication. Include auto-save events after data entry, timestamped resumption options, and cross-device synchronization through user accounts. This ensures that users can continue processes seamlessly without data loss while maintaining strict compliance with data security standards.

title: Secure Document Upload and Management
summary: Facilitate secure document uploading and management for identity verification and service processing.
description: Develop a document submission module that allows uploads of documents (e.g., proof of identity, address, and income). Validate file types, restrict sizes, and scan for malware before storage. Ensure in-transit and at-rest encryption for all uploaded files, establish controlled access permissions, and maintain a review interface for banking staff tasked with document verification.

title: Real-Time Status Tracking and Notifications
summary: Provide live status tracking for requests and send automatic updates via email and messages.
description: Create a system to track the progress of applications, service modifications, and document approvals in real time. Customers should receive structured updates through dashboards and automated email/SMS notifications. Integration with an event-driven architecture will ensure low-latency updates, improving customer transparency and reducing support dependency.

title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Audit Trail
summary: Maintain a full history log of all user actions and interactions to ensure transparency and regulatory compliance.
description: Implement immutable audit logging for all user activities, including logins, transactions, uploads, and requests. The system should allow users to view their interaction history and provide administrators with audit tools for compliance reviews. Logs must include timestamps, activity types, and IDs, and they should be encrypted and stored with version control to comply with data retention regulations.

title: Core Banking System Integration Layer
summary: Seamlessly integrate the self-service portal with the bank’s existing core banking system.
description: Develop secure APIs and middleware that enable real-time data exchange between the portal and core banking systems. Synchronize account data, product eligibility, service requests, and transaction updates while ensuring consistent records. Implement retry logic, caching, and monitoring tools for high availability. The integration layer must support scalable communication with the core platform during peak usage periods.

title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) System
summary: Implement robust access control policies tailored to user roles and authorizations.
description: Develop an RBAC framework where different user roles—such as customers, administrators, and service officers—have tailored permissions. Ensure that visibility of products, features, and data aligns with defined access levels. Include audit reporting for all access changes and privilege escalations while adhering to the principles of least privilege for securing confidential data.

title: Dedicated Portal Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Create an independent, modern database for the portal to maximize scalability and maintain data integrity.
description: Build a standalone portal database with optimized data structures to handle workflows, session management, and user records efficiently. Employ caching mechanisms, indexing strategies, and replication to minimize latency and enhance query performance. Integrate database backup and disaster recovery processes while ensuring all data encryption standards are met.
